Check if the widget is disabled.

Returns
boolean Button is disabled
OOUI\Widget::setDisabled (   $disabled)

Set the disabled state of the widget.

This should probably change the widgets' appearance and prevent it from being used.

Parameters
boolean$disabledDisable widget
Returns
$this

Member Data Documentation

boolean OOUI\Widget::$disabled = false
protected

Disabled.

Widget is disabled

boolean OOUI\Widget::$supportsSimpleLabel = false
static

Whether this widget will behave reasonably when wrapped in a HTML <label>.

If this is true, wrappers such as FieldLayout may use a <label>.
